description:
Keith and I had been talking since he came out for his first video.
As you may recall, he was the guy who made you go "hmmmm." He said he'd done guy-on-guy stuff before, but that it was a thing of the past. OK...
So we had been talking about having him come back out and it always seemed to be something. Girls. Work. School. Whatever.
When I mentioned that I was going to Hawaii and wanted to take some guys with me to do a few shoots here and there — well, all the issue disappeared, almost magically!
Keith had also told me that he would "entertain" the idea of putting his dick up another guy's butt, but I had a different idea. I wanted him to get fucked first. He really wanted to be the top, but I had my mind made up.
I can only imagine what went through his head. "Getting fucked. Hawaii. Getting fucked. Hawaii."
Needless to say, Hawaii won out.
As I'm sure most of you have guessed, my favorite Matt was also on the invite list (how could he not be?).
And I wanted Matt to fuck Keith.
You know what? Keith loved every minute of it, which, quite honestly, is no big surprise!
title: Hawaii - Keith and Matt
